reviews.review:
This game is a masterpiece. I can not put in words how much i loved the story in this game. The ending is amazing and GLaDOS is now one of my favorite video game characters.
I love the Half-Life and Portal universe and I can't wait to see what Valve has in store after making Half-Life Alyx.
Thank you Valve.

Portal 2 is a great sequel to the first installment. My only wish is that the game was longer. The characters were great as well as the atmosphere. I've always loved a good post-apocalyptic theme and this game captures it perfectly. There are a lot of little details, especially in the later half of the game, that really add to the experience.
Why would you even need a review?
b u e n a r d o

What an excellent sequel to an already amazing game! I will say that Portal 2 is one of the few sequels I would argue is even better than the original. Portal was an excellent puzzle game, and the plot was simple but filled with excellent humor. Portal 2 goes even further and enhances so many aspects of the game, including the plot. Also, one of the main characters is voiced by comedian Stephen Merchant, who does a phenomenal job! If you're looking for an entertaining and relaxing game filled with humor and simple yet challenging puzzles, this is a great choice.
it can be challenging at times so it requires you to think, but it's not impossible and can become easy enough when you realise what you're supposed to do

Everything about this game flows with the first while giving it more open world elements, the visual and sound affects are perfect for the style of the game, this would pass just as well as it did back when it came out and in 2020, due to the godlike game and the massive fanbase
-Obama
Still the best and most creative puzzle game out there

absolutely wonderful. smashing, i might say. i played this throughout my childhood on the xbox 360 and i've never gotten tired of it. the voice acting is beautiful, the characters are well rounded and the little easter eggs you can find are incredible. kisses, 10/10.
Great puzzles, nice story. I would like a third one though.

Portal 2 is the first portal game i ever played. it's great. not to sound obsessed, but this game has got the following: Great humor, amazing writing, funny and interesting characters, and most of all, it has a great story. i really can't say anything bad about this game.
chell make me go ahahh oooh :)

Great game. Best puzzle game i have ever played.
Smart vidya, dont play if dumb

Basically just a slight downgrade from the first game, some of the puzzles consisted of trying to find where to go in the first place, good ideas with the gels but not used to full potential. Characters were cool, but maybe just a bit too much. Overall 11/10 a little something for everybody

Holy crap, this game is a masterpiece. I don't even know where to start except at you just need to buy it and find out why for yourself. It felt like this game was made in 2020, it aged like fine wine.

I‚Äôd never played a valve game before Portal 2, but after a friend had recommended me the game, I tried it out for myself. Whilst I had not played the first game at the time, diving into the story was very simple and welcoming to a newcomer. I found the different levels very fun and complex at times. Puzzle games are some of my favourite games to play, and whilst jumping through portals continuously did make me feel nauseous at times, I felt a sense of achievement once I completed a level. The story nicely ties these levels together as well.
